Name: Bondage Nightmare
About the game: You have a terrible nightmare. You are in a scary place. You feel that you need to get to your phone. But it will not be just because you are tightly bound. Get to the phone to complete the level. From the phone is a sound wave, which tells where the phone is. On some levels you will meet zombies. Do your best to avoid meeting them. Key Features: Bound girl simulator. You will control the bound girl. 10 levels with different difficulty. The zombies you have to avoid. Infinite replayability. The phone will appear all the time in different places. Customization. You can change the color of hair, rope and underwear as you like. And also choose one of several gags.
